channel.title: Connection problems, it's weird?
channel.description:
Alright so, here's my problem.
When I host the server on my computer, I can't log on from my laptop. (with the client)
The IP in the client is set fine, everything works. But, when I host the server on my laptop, I can't log in from my computer.
And, on my laptop, I can log on when I host it on my laptop at the same time and same with my computer.
BY THE WAY: Everyone else can log in when I host on my computer, but only I can connect when I host on my laptop..
Any help please?

item.title: Connection problems, it's weird?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“slogieftw, post:4, topic:397438”][quote author=Marine5287 link=topic=494583.msg3616017#msg3616017 date=1306974602]

will u help get mine online? you can be co owner i have tv just inbox me

Don’t reply unless you’re helping, and don’t take peoples threads…
@Topic:
Just change everything to your local host, which is 127.0.0.1 since everyone else already has the right IP in their client.
[/quote]

Yeah, My client has 127.0.0.1 in it. I can connect, but no one else can. (their clients have the real IP)

then, when I host on my laptop, and try to log on from my computer with the ip, it doesn’t log in, and vice versa…[/quote]

The only thing that I can think of is that you missed changing an IP. You can try 0.0.0.0 also.

Read full topic

Yeah, My client has 127.0.0.1 in it. I can connect, but no one else can. (their clients have the real IP)

then, when I host on my laptop, and try to log on from my computer with the ip, it doesn’t log in, and vice versa…
